article_title: Obama Nike Speech Portland Oregon WATCH LIVE STREAM VIDEO
article_text:
President Barack Obama is in Portland, Oregon on Friday, where he will attend a fundraiser for the Democratic National Committee and deliver a speech at Nike headquarters that is expected to focus on international trade. Live coverage of the event will begin at approximately 12:15 p.m. ET.

Watch live stream video below, via NBC News:

[Photo via The White House]
